p:
After reviewing the emergent themes from the scoping review, we asked the following key questions of the current body of knowledge on climate change and mental health as it pertains to CCHVAAs to guide the analysis:
How can mental health considerations be integrated into CCHVAAs?
How can the current literature support health authorities to assess the burden of mental illness in relation to climate change?
How can the current literature support health authorities to assess positive mental health in relation to climate change?
What would a comprehensive assessment of climate change impacts to mental health look like?
What are the limitations of integrating mental health indicators into climate change and health assessments?
What are the opportunities of assessing mental health adaptation opportunities?
